item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Drainer and The Ghoul
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
The Drainer

Neutral Offensive
Masquerade (Passive) - Your visits will be not shown
Dilute Bloodlines (Passive) - Occupying player with Royal Blood lose two uses and regains 1 use of Potence
Potence (Day) - Buff your Drain Essence ability by bypassing occupation and target changing immunity (2 uses)
Drain Essense (Night) - Occupy your target that takes away one limited use
Minion (Night) - Choose target to become your Ghoul (1 use)
Your objective is to survive and see The Blue Dragon, The Unseen or The Cult lose at end of the game

The Ghoul

Neutral Special
Incognito (Passive) - The Ghoul’s original class will be shown
Vicious Cycle (Passive) - When Original Drainer dies, you become the new Drainer.
Revelation (Day) - Choose target and receive day/night feedback in next day (4 uses)
Creeping (Night) - You discover target’s immunity and informs to The Drainer
Your objective is to survive and see The Blue Dragon, The Unseen or The Cult lose at end of the game

NOTES!

1 - Drainer can’t convert Antagonist factions such as Unseen or Cult
2 - Drainer can’t convert Fool, Prince or King
3 - Ghoul becoming new Drainer can’t use Minion as it’s spend by original Drainer.
4 - When the player have no limited uses remaining while occupy attempt is made, it will always fail.
5 - When both Drainer and Mastermind or Cult Leader convert the same target, Drainer won’t lose this 1 use and fail.
6 - When you activate Potence, you can not able to get occupied or redirected
7 - This does not have separate day or night chat when you have Ghoul like antagonists, Prince or Psychic.
